Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.name: Cursed Energy Punch
Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.description: The user launches a punch enveloped in their cursed energy

Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.name: Cursed Energy Blast
Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.description: The user launches a blast of raw cursed energy.

Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.name: Divergent Fist
Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.description: The user strikes using a thin layer of cursed energy, and a second wave of cursed energy is unleashed a few moments afterward, effectively creating two impacts with one punch. Hits twice with second hit being 1.5 x damage.

Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.name: Black Flash
Jujutsu-Kaisen-Attacks.description: Black Flash is a distortion in space that occurs within 0.000001 seconds of a physical hit. When this attack is successful the user's attributes increase by 20% for 5 turns

Jujutsu-Kaisen-Abilities.name: Master Hand-to-Hand Combatant
Jujutsu-Kaisen-Abilities.description: Punching based attacks deal 50% more damage
